chara.textHome: My parents were both killed by a Witch.

People in my neighborhood all think they
just disappeared one day, but that ain't true.
It's 'cause I wished for 'em to think that.
But I sure remember!

I've been huntin' down Witches and
workin' as a merc since then...
And I'm not stoppin', ever!
I'm sayin' if ya wanna fight, bring it on!

Once I take every single one of you down,
then maybe you'll get it that
I'm a hell of a merc!

Oooh, this feels wild!
I definitely outdid myself just now!

Whoa, I feel awesome!
There's nowhere to go but up now!

You know what makes the fun times fun?
 Not havin' to do anythin' you don't wanna do!
No lame crap!
You only do the things you WANT to do!

Y'know, makin' grub, cleanin' and stuff...
uh, chores, I guess ya call 'em?

They're sooo annoying.
 I hate that kinda stuff.
I only put in the tiniest effort to get 'em done.

Ugh, I don't GET it! 
I just deal with it if the garbage piles up!
Yo! I've been waitin' for ya!
I'm ready to roll, rarin' to go!
Come on, let's do some huntin'!
Mph...zZz...mornin'?
All right, all right.

I'm awake, ready to...ZzZ.
Hold on a sec...
Just give me a few more minutes...

I kinda wanna tire myself out
a bit more before lunch.
Hey! Wanna be my partner?
Don't worry, I'll go easy on ya!

From what I've seen Witches tend to keep
out of sight at this time of day...

Hmm...
I wonder if there's any hidin' around here!

When I see a Witch, I go after it right away!
But when I don't, I go right to bed!

When you sleep, there's
nothin' to bother you!
Bein' a mercenary is a full-time job!

Whenever I find a Witch, I make sure
to beat 'em up right then and there!
I'm always ready for a fight!
Takin' out all the Witches, that's my job!

Plus, if you're a mercenary, you're even
more likely to run into a Witch!
It's perfect!
I've been waitin'! It's my turn, right?
Haha! I've been ready for a while now!
Let's do this!
I love animals.

I was once even put in charge
of lookin' after my school's pets.
Ya know, like the rabbits, and stuff.

They never seemed to like me, though.
What's up with that, anyway?!
If you hesitate in a fight, you lose.

As soon as you see the enemy,
ya just gotta go BABAM and smash 
their face in. As fast as you can!

There're a lot of annoyin' things
you can't avoid out there...
I wish I could just ignore all that stuff!
I love kickin' back at home!
If I could, I'd do it everday.
But huntin' Witches?

That's a completely different story!
I'm super serious when it comes to that!
I learned about mercenaries from manga.

The first time I saw it, I was like,
"This is the perfect job for me!"
I can't stand Nanaka Tokiwa!
But I gotta admit, she's pretty strong...
Which just makes her even more annoyin'!

That Asuka girl messes up a lot,
but sometimes she holds it
together and does all right...
Only sometimes, though.

It feels great to forget about the details.
Just goin' all out, atttackin' the enemy
with everythin', and anythin', you got!
That's the kinda fightin' that works for me!
Sometimes I think about my parents.

But thinkin' about them just reminds
me that I don't have a family anymore...
Woohoo! Let's get this fight started!
Yay! I won!
Ha! That's no way to fight!
Yep. Turned out exactly as you'd expect.
Lose? What does that even mean?
You called?

Well, when it comes to huntin' Witches,
it's me, Felicia Mitsuki, you're gonna want!
Time to get to work!

Yesss! I'm totally fired up! 
Go, go, go!
Hm?

That's some results right there.
Not bad at all!

Hehe! Feelin' stronger already. 
But I can keep goin'!

I haven't been a Magical Girl for long,
but I've been in a TON of battles.
Pretty much every day!

Ya know what,
I'm stronger than just about anyone

Have ya heard about the Magical Girl
goin' around, challengin' people to a duel?
I wonder if they're gonna challenge me!
